fields.description:
when user trying greater than 4th attempt to withdrawn amount from ATM system, the error message is displaying like'you may only withdrawn up to php32000 per this day.

Expected Value:-should display the error message like 'user has exceded more number of transactions per day'.

Actual Value:-the error message is displaying like'you may only withdrawn up to php32000 per this day.
fields.summary: user trying  5th attempt to withdrawn transaction,it displaying error message like'you may only withdrawn up to php32000 per this day.

os:-Windows xp
version:-3.1
dot net environment
